name: Rifle Renegade
description:
You are a soldier.
You are being used to "protect" the kingdom.
You are intoxicated with a drug that grants superhuman strength and speed.
This drug is only lethal after you STOP taking it for 12 seconds. 
The general will only give you another dose if she's happy with your kill count.

This game was made in a week and a half for a game jam we held in the Game Endeavor Discord server.

My Twitter for if you want to see more of my pixels: https://twitter.com/LucyLavend
Feel free to comment if you have any suggestions
